concept.title: Querying using MapReduce views
concept.shortdesc: MapReduce views support a variety of different use-cases and can be used as a primary index, secondary index, complex secondary indexes using composite keys, and to support basic aggregation using reduce functions.

section.title: Administrator Authorization
section.p:
To delete a Couchbase bucket, an administrator must have one of these roles:
Full administrator
Cluster administrator
